duration.reason: Longer samples provide more stable metrics

audio_clarity.reason: Many unclear words indicate audio/speech quality issues

boundary_proximity.reason: Scores on .0/.5 boundaries are less stable

confidence.recommendation: Very low confidence. Score unreliable. Retest required with better audio conditions.

descriptors.fluency_coherence: Able to keep going readily with long turns. Some hesitation and repetition mid-sentence.
descriptors.pronunciation: Displays all positive features of band 6, and some of band 8.
descriptors.lexical_resource: Resource flexibly used for variety of topics. Awareness of style evident.
descriptors.grammatical_range_accuracy: Both simple and complex sentences used effectively despite some errors.

feedback.fluency_coherence: Good fluency. Generally able to sustain speech with occasional hesitations.
feedback.pronunciation: Generally clear pronunciation. Minor variations do not affect understanding.
feedback.overall_recommendation: Good overall performance. Minor areas for refinement in accuracy and range.
